definition: The term refers to the highest point or climax of an event, experience, or process. It is commonly used to describe the peak or culmination of something, often in a figurative or metaphorical sense.

examples.german: Der Höhepunkt des Films war die spektakuläre Verfolgungsjagd.
examples.english: The climax of the movie was the spectacular chase scene.

examples.german: Der Höhepunkt der Party war die Überraschungstorte.
examples.english: The highlight of the party was the surprise cake.

examples.german: Der Höhepunkt des Konzerts war der Auftritt der Band.
examples.english: The peak of the concert was the band's performance.

examples.german: Der Höhepunkt der Reise war der Besuch des Eiffelturms.
examples.english: The pinnacle of the trip was the visit to the Eiffel Tower.

examples.german: Der Höhepunkt des Buches war die unerwartete Wendung am Ende.
examples.english: The high point of the book was the unexpected twist at the end.
